titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the last full week of October, October 23 through October 29, 1988, as "National Adult Immunization Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Designates October 23 through October 29, 1988, as National Adult Immunization Awareness Week.
